activities: easyBackgrounds provides background screening services to employers, including but not limited to research of court records, motor vehicle operation records, employment and education verification, professional license and certificate verification, reference checking and Address History searches. It is the execution of these services on behalf of our clients that we wish to cover; we do not seek to cover human resources. Information related to these services is transmitted online via our Website.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client information, consumer/subject data, and information resources.
